plugins.name: Component Pro
plugins.description: To improve my work efficiency, especially in mastering the Component, I made this plugin. It contains many enhancements for Figma‚Äôs Component and Instance features.Just to be clear, I am not very good at HTML and TypeScript, some code was written by chatGPT, so welcome to feedback by sending mail to woshixwn@gmail.com.Here is a detailed introduction to each function of the plugin.Track Com/InsChange the current selection to correspond to the Component/Instance.You need to select some instances or components first. For instances, run this function will change selection to their main components, but will not change viewport. For components, will select corresponding instances.Of course, corresponding components/instances need to be in the same page.Track BrothersFind instances with the same main component.Select Instances, and run this function, all instances that has the main component will be selected.Be aware that if the page has many layers, it may take a lot of time.Clone & InheritBatch replace layers with specific instance.First, Select a component or an instance named ‚Äúmaster‚Äù.Second, select more layers.Third, run the function, and the layers selected in 2nd step will replace to 1st step‚Äôs instance (create by component or clone by ‚Äòmaster‚Äô instance).If you choose to select other instances in 2nd step, if it has the same properties as 1st step component/instance, replaced instance will keep the value.Text2InstancesBatch replace text layers with specific instance.This function is a lot like ‚Äò‚ÄôClone & Inherit‚Äô, but the layers be replaced need to be text or a combination of texts.For example, select a component which has 2 text properties, and select a frame contains 2 text layers, then run this function, the frame will be replace to instance created by component, with text properties being assigned to characters of those 2 text layers.Fully DetachDetach an instance and the instance insideI think the description is simple enough, but just in case, let me give an example.If you have an instance, it has 2 sub-layer, all is instance. Once you run this function, instance and its sub-instances will all be detached.By the way, the layer that is hidden will be removed, otherwise it looks to mess.Update ins InsideSelect all instances can be updatedSelect some Frames, Groups, Components or even Instances first. Running this function will find out all instances belong to those that can be updated.Noticed, It may take a long time to analysis each instance type sub-layers,¬†I still try to improve that.Comp SelectionMake selection a componentThis function will make it a component by your selection, replace the selection with an instance that created by the new component.Make sure that all selection are belong to the same parent.--------Next, some features may not exactly made for component, but they also useful(and I really don‚Äôt want to code another plugin).Auto RenameRename selected layers and their sub-layersSwap LayerExchange the position of selected layersMake MaxQuickly set the size of selected layer to their parents‚Äô size.Sort LayerChange the order in left side panel of selected layers by their position.Perfect CornerQuickly set selected layers‚Äô independent corners to 60%(iOS like).Round PixelRound layer‚Äôs position and width/height to PixelAdjust Outer SizeAdjust Component Set, Section, Frame‚Äôs size according to their sublayers.I know Figma has its own official feature, but I made an adjustment, the adjust margin will choose the minimum value.That's all for now, I guess.
plugins.tagline: Component, Instance, Enhancement

103754.name: Component Pro
103754.description: To improve my work efficiency, especially in mastering the Component, I made this plugin. It contains many enhancements for Figma‚Äôs Component and Instance features.Just to be clear, I am not very good at HTML and TypeScript, some code was written by chatGPT, so welcome to feedback by sending mail to woshixwn@gmail.com.Here is a detailed introduction to each function of the plugin.Track Com/InsChange the current selection to correspond to the Component/Instance.You need to select some instances or components first. For instances, run this function will change selection to their main components, but will not change viewport. For components, will select corresponding instances.Of course, corresponding components/instances need to be in the same page.Track BrothersFind instances with the same main component.Select Instances, and run this function, all instances that has the main component will be selected.Be aware that if the page has many layers, it may take a lot of time.Clone & InheritBatch replace layers with specific instance.First, Select a component or an instance named ‚Äúmaster‚Äù.Second, select more layers.Third, run the function, and the layers selected in 2nd step will replace to 1st step‚Äôs instance (create by component or clone by ‚Äòmaster‚Äô instance).If you choose to select other instances in 2nd step, if it has the same properties as 1st step component/instance, replaced instance will keep the value.Text2InstancesBatch replace text layers with specific instance.This function is a lot like ‚Äò‚ÄôClone & Inherit‚Äô, but the layers be replaced need to be text or a combination of texts.For example, select a component which has 2 text properties, and select a frame contains 2 text layers, then run this function, the frame will be replace to instance created by component, with text properties being assigned to characters of those 2 text layers.Fully DetachDetach an instance and the instance insideI think the description is simple enough, but just in case, let me give an example.If you have an instance, it has 2 sub-layer, all is instance. Once you run this function, instance and its sub-instances will all be detached.By the way, the layer that is hidden will be removed, otherwise it looks to mess.Update ins InsideSelect all instances can be updatedSelect some Frames, Groups, Components or even Instances first. Running this function will find out all instances belong to those that can be updated.Noticed, It may take a long time to analysis each instance type sub-layers,¬†I still try to improve that.Comp SelectionMake selection a componentThis function will make it a component by your selection, replace the selection with an instance that created by the new component.Make sure that all selection are belong to the same parent.--------Next, some features may not exactly made for component, but they also useful(and I really don‚Äôt want to code another plugin).Auto RenameRename selected layers and their sub-layersSwap LayerExchange the position of selected layersMake MaxQuickly set the size of selected layer to their parents‚Äô size.Sort LayerChange the order in left side panel of selected layers by their position.Perfect CornerQuickly set selected layers‚Äô independent corners to 60%(iOS like).Round PixelRound layer‚Äôs position and width/height to PixelAdjust Outer SizeAdjust Component Set, Section, Frame‚Äôs size according to their sublayers.I know Figma has its own official feature, but I made an adjustment, the adjust margin will choose the minimum value.That's all for now, I guess.
103754.release_notes:
I add some ux improvement in this version:

1. List item(Like 'Track Components') now is only enable when available layers are selected. For example, if you select a component, you can't click "Track Components" now. Reducing the risk to click wrong feature.
2. Split "Track Com/Ins" into 2 functions, Track Components and Track Instances. The reason is the same as above.
3. Add new feature, Clone Main Comp, it will clone main components of instances selected.
4. Update ins inside now has a loading state when analysis layers, cause it may take long time.
5. texts2instances now support nested instances
6. I add each function to menu's sub-menu, so you can use command+/ then type function name to quick execute it.

plugins.name: Auto Select
plugins.description: Auto Select is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow by providing advanced selection tools. With Auto Select, you can easily select objects by name and hierarchy, making it effortless to navigate and manipulate complex designs. Whether you're working on a small project or a large-scale design system, Auto Select is the perfect companion to enhance your productivity and creativity in Figma.Key Features:Select objects by name: Quickly find and select objects by entering their names.Select parent and child layers: Navigate through the hierarchy of your design by selecting parent or child layers.Undo selection: Easily undo selections to refine your choices.Select all: Select all objects in your current Figma canvas with a single click.Close plugin: Close the plugin window when you're done selecting objects.You can select child layers of selected object and then parent layer of selected child layer .How to Use:Enter the name of the object you want to select in the input field.Click on the "Select Object" button to select the object.Use the other buttons to perform various selection actions, such as selecting all objects, selecting parent layers, selecting child layers, undoing selections, and closing the plugin.Get Started with Auto Select today and take your Figma workflow to the next level!
plugins.tagline: "Effortless Selection, Seamless Design: Auto Select simplifies your Figma workflow."

plugins.name: AI Page Manager
plugins.description: AI Page Manager is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your page management workflow. With this tool, you can effortlessly rename, add, delete, and reorder pages in your Figma file, all from a single, intuitive interface.Key features:1. Batch Rename: Quickly rename multiple pages at once.2. Add Pages: Create new pages with custom names in just a few clicks.3. Delete Pages: Remove unwanted pages easily and safely.4. Reorder Pages: Drag and drop to rearrange your pages in any order you prefer.5. Add Separators: Organise your pages with visual separators for better structure.6. Refresh: Sync your plugin view with the latest changes in your Figma file.How to use:1. Open the plugin to see a list of all pages in your current Figma file.2. To rename a page, simply type the new name in the input field next to the current page name.3. To add a new page, click the "+" button and enter a name for your new page.4. To delete a page, click the trash can icon next to the page you want to remove.5. To reorder pages, drag and drop the pages into your desired sequence.6. To add a separator, click the "Add Separator" button.7. Once you've made your changes, click "Apply Changes" to update your Figma file.8. Use the refresh button to sync the plugin with any external changes made to your file.The AI Page Manager also includes a teaser for upcoming AI-powered features, hinting at future enhancements that will make your page management even more efficient.Whether you're working on a small project or a complex design system with numerous pages, AI Page Manager helps you keep your Figma files organized and your workflow smooth. Say goodbye to tedious page management and hello to a more productive design process!
plugins.tagline: Easily rename, add, delete and reorder pages in your Figma file.

plugins.name: Sticky Status
plugins.description: Status block for frames or components to assist in project status tracking and status note taking. This plugin allows you to add a block that is attached to your page/frame to allows you to set a status and leave comments/notes about the status.The following statuses are supported currently:DraftIn ProgressReady for ReviewUnder ReviewApprovedReady for DevelopmentNot NeededNOTE: At this time, this plugin will not work with instances. Instances don't allow modification so the plugin is unable to add the status widget to the frame. In order to make this work, you can wrap your instance in a frame and then apply the status. You can add an auto-layout with all 0s for spacing and it will not impact the layout or design.

plugins.name: dixma
plugins.description:
What is Dixma?Dixma is a 4-12 player storytelling party game in Figma, inspired by the the card game Dixit.Video Walkthrough (YouTube)Game Board Required: https://www.figma.com/community/file/889925301071649823Game RulesEach round all players have 6 random cards. The storyteller for the round shares a clue about one of their cards, and every other player picks their card that best fits the storyteller's story. The cards are revealed and all the players (other than the storyteller) guess which card they think is the storyteller's.ScoringIf ALL players find the Storyteller‚Äôs card,or NO¬†players find the Storyteller‚Äôs card:Storyteller: 0 points¬†
Other players: 2 points¬†¬†
If at least one player but not all players find the card:¬†Storyteller: 3 points¬†
Players who have found the card: 3 points¬†
In either case:+1 bonus point per vote on your card if you
 are not the storyteller, up to 3 per round.

Using advanced HSV color mapping and B√©zier curves, this plugin helps you generate professional color palettes.Key Features:Effortless Palette GenerationAuto Naming: Generate intuitive color names automatically based on hue values, ensuring consistency and saving time.Customizable Steps: Choose the exact number of shades per swatch to suit your project needs.Powerful B√©zier Curve ControlInteractive Curve Editor: Adjust color transitions using an intuitive B√©zier curve interface integrated with an HSV color picker for unprecedented accuracy.Predefined and Customizable Curves: Pick from pre-made curves or switch to free-hand mode for full creative freedom.AccessibilityContrast Ratio Analysis: Automatically assess each color's contrast ratio against black and white backgrounds to ensure accessibility compliance.Color Tokens: Assign unique identifiers to every shade for hassle-free referencing across your designs.Seamless Integration and ExportExport Color Tokens: Export your palette as JSON tokens for integration into your design systems or development workflows.Figma Frame Export: Instantly export palettes as organized frames within the current page of your Figma file for easy sharing and collaboration.Style Creation: Create reusable styles directly in your Figma file with one click, streamlining your workflow.This plugin is perfect for design systems, brand guidelines, or any project requiring consistent color scales. It streamlines the color creation process while ensuring your palettes meet professional quality standards.Elevate your design process with an intelligent color generation that combines creative freedom with technical precision.

plugins.name: Stream Screen Manager
plugins.description: Stream Screen Manager revolutionizes the way fast food restaurants manage their digital signage displays. Created by Stream, a leading digital signage company, this Figma Plugin bridges the gap between design and dynamic content management for digital menu boards and drive-thrus. This innovative tool is designed to streamline the content management process, enabling restaurants to update their digital signage directly from Figma - the world‚Äôs premier design tool.With Stream Screen Manager, users can effortlessly create captivating digital signage layouts tailored to their brand. The plugin facilitates real-time editing of menu pricing, text descriptions, photos, and more, ensuring that your digital displays always reflect the most current offerings and promotions. Whether you‚Äôre looking to make quick updates to your menu or overhaul your drive-thru‚Äôs digital experience, this plugin provides all the tools necessary to achieve your goals with ease.Key Features:Real-Time Content Management: Directly update menu items, prices, and promotions across all your digital signage from within Figma. Changes are reflected instantly on your displays, keeping your content fresh and engaging.Seamless POS Integration: Streamline operations with our plugin‚Äôs ability to integrate directly with Point of Sale systems, ensuring price and menu item consistency across your digital displays and sales channels.Customizable Templates: Access a library of customizable design templates specifically crafted for fast food restaurants, making it easy to maintain brand consistency across all your signage.Drag-and-Drop Interface: Utilize Figma‚Äôs intuitive drag-and-drop interface to design your digital signage layouts. Easily add photos, text, and pricing information without needing advanced design skills.Collaboration Made Simple: Collaborate in real-time with your team members on signage designs. Figma‚Äôs collaborative environment ensures that everyone can contribute to the final product, from marketers to graphic designers.Stream Screen Manager is perfect for fast food restaurants looking to take control of their digital signage content with the flexibility and power of Figma. Say goodbye to outdated menus and hello to a dynamic, engaging customer experience with Stream Screen Manager. Transform your digital menu boards and drive-thrus today, and serve up the freshest content with ease.

plugins.name: Figma to React by Figroot
plugins.description: Instantly turn Figma into a pixel-perfect, responsive React and Tailwind CSS website. Saves you 10x time, completely for free. This tool is intended for Design Engineers to speed up their workflow immensely.Watch the demo video here.FeaturesImage download button for all images within the selection.Font support that automatically detects and adds the fonts needed. Tailwind custom config support for fonts (variables WIP).We are continuing to improve the experimental Responsive Screen setting.How to useClick the Figma screenCopy the generated codePaste the code into page.tsx or any component your app.Paste the generated fonts and tailwind code into the corresponding files.Viola! Pixel-perfect code!How to set up the React websiteBelow are the instructions to run your own React website, using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.Download Node.js (LTS) from the official website here.Next, install TypeScript using the command in your terminal: npm install -g typescriptCreate a Next.js app using the command in your terminal: npx create-next-app@latestName your project your-project-name.On installation, spam enter to use the default settings for the prompts.Download Visual Studio Code here.Open Visual Studio Code, click File > Open Folder > your-project-nameIn the upper left, click Terminal (it could be hidden in the 3 dots), then New Terminal.In the Terminal, type npm i, then npm run dev.Hold ctrl and click the link next to Local:, should look something like: http://localhost:3000Congrats! Your Next.js app is running.
plugins.tagline: Turn Figma into a React and Tailwind CSS website for free

plugins.name: exportLang.json
plugins.description: This Figma plugin, named exportLang, streamlines the process of extracting static texts from Figma designs and generating variable names for these texts through ChatGPT. The workflow is as follows:Data Retrieval:The plugin reads a JSON file, exportLang.json, where users store static texts from their Figma designs.Variable Name Assignment:For each static text in the JSON file, the plugin generates a unique variable name. For example, if there are three texts, the variable names might be text1, text2, and text3.ChatGPT Interaction:Using the generated variable names and their corresponding static texts, the plugin communicates with ChatGPT. It sends prompts to ChatGPT, requesting translation of the static texts into variable names.Response Handling:The plugin receives responses from ChatGPT, containing suggested variable names. These responses are associated with the original static texts.Output in JSON Format:The final output is a JSON file containing a mapping between variable names and their respective static texts. This structured JSON output facilitates easy integration into users' Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: exportLang.json

plugins.name: Chart Cleaner
plugins.description: Drop your newly exported chart out of RAWGraphs and into Figma, then select it and run the plugin. Voila. Chart Cleaner duplicates the frame, cleans all the layers up, reorganizes everything, and then drops the new chart and legend (if you had one) into a new auto layout, ready for you to add your own copy and styles to. Everything remains editable as you'd normally expect.Currently supports RAWGraphs SVGs, with Flourish coming soon. Currently cleans bar charts, small multiple bar charts, line graphs, and small multiple line graphs, with more coming soon.Feedback more than welcome!

plugins.name: Switchbox - Component Instance Replacer
plugins.description: Switchbox is a powerful plugin designed to help designers migrate from old to new components effortlessly. With bulk replace functionality, users can quickly find and replace components, saving hours of manual work. It's a game-changer for teams transitioning to updated components, making the tedious process of replacing one-by-one a thing of the past. The plugin also supports transferring text data from old components to new ones, ensuring seamless migration.Stay tuned for upcoming versions, where support for more data types will make migration even smoother and more efficient!
plugins.tagline: Simplify your component migration with ease and speed

plugins.name: Aspector - Image Aspect Ratio Resizer
plugins.description: Aspector helps designers quickly resize selected elements to common or custom aspect ratios. The plugin shows the current ratio of selected elements and allows choosing from presets like 16:9, 4:3, 1:1, and more. You can also enter custom ratios and choose how dimensions are maintained (width, height, larger dimension, or smaller dimension). Perfect for preparing assets for different platforms or ensuring design consistency.Instructions:Run the Aspector pluginSelect an image, frame, or other element in FigmaChoose a preset aspect ratio or enter a custom oneSelect how you want to maintain dimensionsClick "Resize" to apply changesWhat problem does this plugin solve?Manually calculating and adjusting dimensions to achieve specific aspect ratios is time-consuming and error-prone. Aspector automates this process, saving designers time and ensuring precise results.
plugins.tagline: Quickly resize images and frames to specific aspect ratios while maintaining dimensions.

plugins.name: Xerus
plugins.description: Xerus helps you to organize the texts of your designs while having powerful tools to automate your text workflow. It synchronizes your figma text and your Airtable database.Xerus is for free! I am glad I can contribute to the community. Airtable has a free version too, that supports a maximum of text entries, please check their price plan to see which option is best for you.Getting startedThere are several ways to use Xerus in your project. In this website, I explain you step by step how to set up Xerus for your project. Do you want to change the language of all text in your design? Do you want to update all instances of a text? Xerus can do it for you.FeaturesText synchronization between Airtable database and Figma.Multiple layer synchronization pointing to the same database entry.Single layer synchronization.Multiple database connectionsIncoming featuresDo you have suggestions to improve Xerus?
